name: Anamanaguchi
description:
'''Anamanaguchi''' is an American [[chiptune]]-based pop and rock band from New York City. The band has four members: lead songwriters and guitarists Peter Berkman and Ary Warnaar, bassist James DeVito, and drummer Luke Silas.

Anamanaguchi combines digital electronic sounds such as those seen in [[chiptune]] and [[bitpop]] with traditional band instrumentation. As with other chiptune artists, they have created music using video game hardware from the mid- to late 1980s: namely a [[Nintendo Entertainment System|NES]] and a [[Game Boy]].
